mention.text: the damage caused by the latest terrorist attacks against the country 's oil pipeline
four dynamite attacks on the pipeline in the last 72 hours
eln guerrillas , which have claimed responsibility for the attacks on the oil pipeline , exerting pressure to modify the oil policy
the pipeline at km-28 in cano limon-covenas
the result of the army 's first counterinsurgency actions against those determined to do away with the nation 's resources by attacking the cano limon-covenas pipeline
the eln , commanded by spanish priest manuel perez
